name: MyTitleGalMinutes
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
My Title Gal Minutes is hosted by Shannon Goldberg, sales executive and top sales generator for Grand Canyon Title Agency, a division for FNTA. A 17 year veteran of the real estate, title and escrow industry, Shannon shares quick tips & tricks in marketing for realtors and lenders to help increase their brand awareness. 

Incorporating major social media platforms as well as new technology. Trying to keep it quick and easy for those in a fast paced industry. Shannon feels that these tips & tricks can be applied to any individually looking to grown their brand, be consistent in their marketing and create referrals.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
